problem.title: Two Sum
problem.description: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target.
problem.input_format: The input consists of an array of integers 'nums' of length n, and an integer 'target'.
problem.output_format: Return the indices of the two numbers in an array.
hints: A brute force solution would use two loops to check each pair of numbers.
Think about using a hash map to keep track of the indices of the numbers already processed.
